title: A Natural question
creator_credit: Central Electricity Generating Board Film Unit and Stan Gomm
brief_description: Deals with the liaison between the sponsor and nature conservationists; showing some of the special nature trails they have set up for children in industrialised areas and describing other ways in which they are contributing towards nature conservancy. Presented by Phil Drabble with Art Direction by Richard Piper.
